page.title: 13Churches and Chapels.
page.content: The four Anglican churches in the area are now in the united benefice of the Parish Church of Cannington where the Rector of all five churches lives.The Parish Church of All Saints Otterhampton is a heavily restored mediaeval building with one service a month.It may close shortly.Its daughter church,St Peter's,Combwich,is the centre for Anglican worship in the area.It is a Victorian building.There are two services on Sunday.The Curate lives nearby.Stockland Church of St.Mary Magdalene is a Victorian replacement to a much earlier building.It is a Parish Church in its own right with two services a month. Its daughter church is St.Andrews at Steart.It is a small Victorian Church. The Methodist Chapel in Combwich is on the Bridgwater Circuit.The building is Victorian and was a Seamen's Mission.
